title: Where is Mila?
heading: Where is Mila?
body:
‧₊˚❀༉‧

Friday morning plan: 

* Panther Mtn via Giant Ledge 
* Parking at Giant Ledge (White 2019 Subaru, NY plates) 

*Dear* *future Mila please don't get both the flu and covid vaccines just before going to the mountains thank you ヾ⁠(⁠˙⁠❥⁠˙⁠)⁠ﾉ*

ᨒ↟ᨒ↟
